metadata.title: CVE-2017-15401 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A memory corruption bug in WebAssembly could lead to out of bounds read andwrite through V8 in WebAssembly in Google Chrome prior to 62.0.3202.62allowed a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
